indiyan kandayama palamu wataye sahabhagiwu tharagawalin dakunu aprikawa hamuwe parajaya labuwa.engalanthaya samaga tharagaya yantham lakunu sama karagaththa.ithiri tharaga jayagena bi kandaye dewaniya lesa palamu wataya nimakala.supiri kangaruwanwa ardha awasan purwa watayedi parajaya karadamu indiyawa awasan purwa watayedi pakisthanaya lakunu 29kin parada awasan maha tharagayata sudusukam labuwa.hari dan balamu depile  dakshatha saha durwalatha monawada kiyala.indiyan pile shakthimathma anshaya thamayi pithikarana anshaya.indiyan pila gaththahama sachin thendulkar sita suresh rayina dakwama siyalu pithikaruwan lakunu athara sitinawa(doni hara).namuth madapele pithikaruwangen awasthawata anuwa krida karanne yuwaraj sin saha rayina witharayi.gambir awasayama awasthawala hodin krida nokirimath nayakaya lakunu athara nositimath owunta gataluwak.owunge pandu yawime anshaya gaththahama sampurna barakarata gena krida karanne sahir kan.
